name: Scientist Chamber
description:
"Ok hear me out...what if...Disc Room...but but it's a chamber full of scientists?" - I said out loud to myself and thus Scientist Chamber was born.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move, numbers 1-6 for activating unlocked skills, everything else will be explained later.

If it's laggy in browser, try the download version. It's only for Windows as I have no other operating systems to test on.

Enjoy.
